body:
Comment 2: 
Another open question:

* Will this plan straightforwardly support lldb as well? See e.g.
http://lldb.llvm.org/scripting.html. Ideally, whatever we build will be usable with both
gdb and lldb, and will continue to work as debugger support moves back and forth between
external integration (gdb-runtime.py) and improved DWARF.
